title: Who said support can't carry
body:
What a frustrating game.. You know when your team gets cocky while you're carrying them and refuses to end the game allowing the enemy team to catch up. My assists alone are higher then everybody's combined kills+assists except for Jinx.

But yer... 4 enemy dead with super minions in their base? Better turn around and do baron instead of winning the game, followed by 20 minutes of lost fights and bickering. Smh..

replies.body: yeah man im sure you single handedly won that game playing support

> [{quoted}](name=Autismo Extremo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0ZtsgR0f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-12T05:56:59.197+0000)
>
> yeah man im sure you single handedly won that game playing support

That's not really what carried means.

> [{quoted}](name=Arcanopulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0ZtsgR0f,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T06:19:40.896+0000)
>
> That's not really what carried means.

Yes it is you fucking idiot, if he didn't win the game on his own he didn't carry anything

> [{quoted}](name=Pretty Pony,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0ZtsgR0f,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T06:28:52.023+0000)
>
> Yes it is you fucking idiot, if he didn't win the game on his own he didn't carry anything

(plays assasins after many fights in lobby chat, feeds 80% of the time)

> [{quoted}](name=Pretty Pony,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0ZtsgR0f,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T06:28:52.023+0000)
>
> Yes it is you fucking idiot, if he didn't win the game on his own he didn't carry anything

on a scale of 1- vegetable. how retarded are you?

Lol it is a bit hard to single handedly win a game, sorry if my definition of carry isn't up to your standards, all I did was make good plays throughout the whole game, caught out their carries throughout the game, stopped the enemy from winning the game 1v4 which finally resulted in us finishing, got my adc fed early, could solo their vayne, surpassed my mid and top lanes gold income and their damage, was positive and upbeat in chat most of the game, had a little outburst near the end while I was luring their vayne and talon away so they couldn't push and win 1v4, then I realised I might still be able to save the game and I did.

Next time I'll make sure it was a 1v5 game before I claim to have carried, sorry. But I can say with confidence that I was extremely influential in the victory. Wish LoL had replays (the 3rd party one is buggy and lags me)
